reviewText: Top DVD. You need a little (Taiji-) experience before, but it is possible to learn this advanced form step by step. Ken instructs clearly understandable. Repeating to view the instructions on the moves and to execute them several times over a considerable time will bring fluidity and speed to the form. My drill ground is terrace (with the notebook on the table) where is enough space to practice with a long weapon. I'm using a staff without spear head. Greatings from Germany.
